```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library("emmeans")
library("R.matlab")
library("data.table")
library("readr")
library("lme4")
```

# Read table
```{r}
baseFolder = "/Users/be_battlestation/Documents/EEGCognitionPrediction/StatisticsDrivers/tbl.csv"
tbl = read_csv(baseFolder)
```

# Run lme

```{r}
mdl = lmer('Accuracy ~ Power * Status + SNR*Status + (SNR + Power | Dataset) + (SNR + Power| Dataset : Subject)', tbl)
```
